entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with Essentials.WebAuthenticator and multiple activities #22017
  • [Testing] BlazorWebViewDispatchGetsScopedServices fails occasionally on Android #22016
    Backlog
  • [BUG][iOS] Maui 8.0.10+ - CarouselView - Previous item content disappears after scrolling to next item #22015
    .NET 8 SR5
  • ObservableCollection<SomeObject>.clear throwing exception #22012
  • The UI element <Frame> causes a crash #22011
  • Scrollview\CollectionView doesn't scroll #22005
  • [Windows] App crashes when rectangle sized by a Grid has a size of 1 on 125% scale screen #22003
    .NET 8 SR5
  • OrientationStateTrigger does not work if in the setters of the state TargetName is used #22001
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22000
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Optimization can be disabled by setting the PublishTrimmed property to false. (NETSDK1144) (UNMC) #21999
  • [iOS] Media Picker UIImagePickerController closing issue #21996
  • [Windows] Some icon fonts not working in unpacked apps #21993
  • Custom BindableProperty on Triggers not working #21992
    Backlog
  • Maui app run with Exception Unhandled "System.StackOverflowException: 'Exception of type 'System.StackOverflowException' was thrown.'" when change maui control to 8.0.40-nightly.10537 #21991
  • [Windows] Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged Exception #21990

Closed

  • [windows] Account for ObjectDisposedException coming from device tests for MauiWebView #21631
    .NET 8 SR5
  • MeasureFirstItem crash app on Android #14796
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Finish tests for "Fix crash closing Popup with WebView" #21846
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Shell Flyout Background on Android doesn't respect theme color - makes menu and flyout items unreadable #19141
  • [Windows] DatePicker doesn't update Date property when you don't select date #22004
  • .NET MAUI > Publish iOS Enterprise App > Wrong Profile #21984
  • [Android] ExpectingPageNotToBreak is currently crashing on legacy tests #21939
    .NET 8 SR5
  • integrate Admob with Maui Blazor #21995
  • failed java.lang.RuntimeException: com.android.tools.r8.CompilationFailedException: #20315
  • MAUI Target Android Framework doesn't seem to be used #21945

PullRequests

Created

  • Navigate Directly to Test #22019
  • Fixed creation of the CustomTabsActivityManager #22018
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Use correct build version check #22013
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • [XC] Compile TemplateBindingExtension #22008
    area/Xaml </>
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in ListView #22007
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Changed order of calls to properly close MediaPicker Activity / ViewController and set the picker result #21998
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] Remove 2nd WebView used to add `base` tag when using HtmlWebViewSource #21892
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add s/triaged label for issues opened by (core) team #22006
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event (Reopened) #21156
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Re-generate template localization #21988
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • [Android] Fix Ripple Effect in ImageButton #21638
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Optimize ordering of children in Flex layout #21961
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, control-picker
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
